title: Opaque Pointer
description: Schema for an opaque pointer envelope, referencing private data.

kind.description: Indicates the type of the pointer.

algo.description: The hashing algorithm used for the digest.

digest.description: Content-address of the private blob, prefixed with the algorithm (e.g., 'blake3:<64hex>').

size.description: Optional: Byte size of the private blob.

location.description: URI indicating where to retrieve the private blob.

capability.description: URI indicating how to authorize/decrypt the private blob.
